summary: The bill, titled the "Reforming and Enhancing Sustainable Updates to Laboratory Testing Services Act of 2025" (RESULTS Act), aims to improve the accuracy and data collection feasibility of Medicare payment rates for clinical diagnostic laboratory tests. It focuses on updating data collection methods, incorporating data from a qualifying comprehensive claims database, and ensuring market-based data by excluding rates from certain organizations. The bill amends Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide long-term stability for Medicare beneficiary access to clinical diagnostic laboratory tests.
